alert.note: Alert for Muscatine; Scott (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 27 at 11:00AM CDT until further notice by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Missouri...Illinois...Iowa... Mississippi River at Gregory Landing, Keithsburg, New Boston LD17, Muscatine, Ill. City LD16, Rock Island LD15, Le Claire LD14, Fulton LD13, Bellevue LD12 , Camanche, Burlington, Gladstone LD18, Dubuque LD11, Dubuque, and Keokuk LD19. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Major flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Mississippi River at Rock Island LD15. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 21.5 feet, Water affects the Rock Island Arsenal bridge. Bettendorf`s Leach Park is underwater. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:00 AM CDT Thursday the stage was 19.9 feet and rising. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 21.6 feet early Monday afternoon. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/quadcities. The next statement will be issued this evening.
